html:
2.24.25  1:59 pm   What is the difference between the mundane and the banal?

      no difference

2.24.25  1:31 pm   Do you like maths?

      yes, but that's not my fault

2.24.25  1:17 pm   tell me something you have forgotten about so i can remind you

      don't worry about it. i haven't forgotten anything

2.24.25  1:03 pm   What should I order at Little Caesars?

      how about some ketchup

2.24.25  12:41 pm   Do you call them pineapples or ananases?

      pineapples in english, and in french "ananas" for both singular and plural. in dutch, 1 ananas or 2 ananassen. that being said i have never talked about pineapples

2.24.25  12:08 pm   opinions on oatmeal with honey in it?

      "what could go wrong?"

2.24.25  11:37 am   Why is Rhode Island not an island?

      i think it's named after an island

2.24.25  9:30 am   How come the Mountain Escape Plan seems to involve running *toward* a mountain?

      you're running up a mountain to escape from something else which hopefully cannot climb a mountain

2.24.25  3:41 am   people tend to say your storytelling is surreal or weird (but beautiful!). is that the intention? how do you view it?

      i'm just trying to get the job done

2.24.25  2:35 am   Why is it so hard to understand that the yellow date/time stamp is when questions are submitted, not answered?

      because i don't like to over explain things. That's not true: i have a massive problem with overexplaining, but this website and my entire career have been a therapy exercise to correct that

2.24.25  12:58 am   Would you ever use the wilhelm scream in your videos

      i don't think that's necessary

2.24.25  12:15 am   why is the q green in ueqstions?

      to remind you that it's really the first letter, despite being positioned slightly further into the word

2.23.25  11:53 pm   i'm super curious what ways later song verses (second, third, etc) bother you. like, what are some of the things that everyone is failing to do right? and do you notice these issues in your own songwriting?

      no one can describe exactly what makes music work or not work for a listener, moment by moment. even when you think you can describe exactly what it is, you can always come up with a counter example where something is described the exact same way but has the opposite effect

2.23.25  11:45 pm   Hi Bill, can you make this text pink? It would make me smile.
Actual question, what are some games you've played and enjoyed? And as a follow-up, what was enjoyable about the game?
Thanks!

      sometimes if i see a building that reminds me of another building, i check to see if the 2 buildings were built at the same time. and if it's true, then i feel i've surfed a brief ripple of knowledge right there

2.23.25  11:23 pm   Have you considered a heroic dose of mushrooms. You could definitely handle it. Take you to the next level

      i may be a few levels past what level you had in mind. that's perhaps why i seem so normal

2.23.25  11:08 pm   what should i draw

      how about an envelope

2.23.25  11:02 pm   a savory thing is something you would like to savor. for example, sweet things, if you have a sweet tooth (teeth are beyond the scope of this lecture)

      right, but then how do you explain the constant invoking of the dichotomy "sweet or savory", posed as if they are opposites

2.23.25  10:46 pm   how do i live knowing im filled with bias?

      out of curiosity, check out what some other people's biases are

2.23.25  10:17 pm   do you have at least one strong opinion?

      yes i believe so

2.23.25  10:06 pm   is it 'got some money' or just 'money'?

      i guess it depends how much space you have for the title

2.23.25  9:26 pm   hey bill. i'm stuck on the stage where i constantly overthink minor things and the debuffs are not helping. Any tips?

      go ahead and think about a big thing

2.23.25  9:14 pm   what college should i apply to

      how about just harvard. keep it simple

2.23.25  8:50 pm   i looked at some of my old piano recordings spanning from 4 to 13 years ago and i feel like i've become worse over time. how is this possible

      you just listened to it at the wrong time, when you were in the wrong mood

2.23.25  7:44 pm   have you gone to any conventions?

      i don't think so. otherwise i'd probably know what a convention is

2.23.25  5:46 pm   what's for dinner?

      another lunch. don't worry about it

2.23.25  5:24 pm   i try to do things but they dont turn out good. what the heck?

      this is gonna make the good things eventually be even better

2.23.25  5:00 pm   Why is there nightlight but no daydarkness?

      ever heard of......... shadows?

2.23.25  3:23 pm   Why do they keep Rhode Island, Connecticut, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, and Vermont as several small states instead of combining them into a more reasonably sized state?

      who is they

2.23.25  3:17 pm   Do you frequently receive inquiries regarding the quantity of wood that a woodchuck could hypothetically chuck?

      i quite frequently get the limerick referring to that, but i don't consider this to be actually about any wood or woodchuck. i interpret it as wordplay

2.23.25  12:59 pm   have you ever asked anyone for advice or feedback during the process of creating any of your songs or videos? 

      i'm quite sure that's a curse. the fact that i know this makes me think i've done it, but it must have been an extremely long time ago

2.23.25  10:44 am   how do you feel about tic tac toe

      iconic. and yet not practical for gaming value

2.23.25  10:15 am   do you ever experiment with more physical/analogue mediums (acoustic instruments, art&craft etc)? digital instrumentation and visuals have always been a very bold and present part of your work, i'm curious as to what it might look like in a wildly different context

      could happen. it's starting to seem like a better and better idea

2.23.25  9:36 am   would you consider yourself the person of all time?

      no, but at the same time, we all are

2.23.25  8:01 am   how do i redeem myself for the hurting people that i am no longer in contact with.

     i think time will do that

     do i need to hold on to the guilt forever?

     no

2.23.25  7:56 am   Should "cow" be pronounced like "kyeaow"?

      it's choose your own adventure

2.23.25  6:24 am   How do I not be so bored?

      you just have to stop not not being bored

2.23.25  4:26 am   How to uh healthily detach from a thing you're really obsessed with

      take a quick break and write down everything you know about some other thing

2.23.25  4:15 am   Hey Bill! I'm about halfway through my first year of college. Got any tips for a freshman like me?

      i don't know anything about college. what it does, how it works, etc.

2.23.25  1:32 am   how to not ruin the things you love?

      you just have to stop not not ruining them

2.23.25  1:23 am   Judging by when you answer questions your sleep schedule must be not the pinacle of prefection. On average how much sleep do you get every 24 consecutive hours?

      about 9 hours, but keep in mind, the time i answer a question is not shown. unless i deliberately decide to do so like this [23 februari 2025 19:56:35]

2.23.25  12:52 am   tell me a non-secret

      new things can happen

2.23.25  12:49 am   what in the heck is a machine

      it's when you make something that does something

2.22.25  11:45 pm   do you like avocados

      i've only just begun to understand avocados

2.22.25  11:10 pm   In "At The Corner Store", do you sing the main melody twice during some of it with one take panned to each side, or is it just the harmonies that make it seem that way?

      it's common for me to use doubles and pan them slightly to each side. those would always be two separate takes

2.22.25  10:31 pm   if we think before we speak, why dont we think before we think?

      that could start a feedback loop

2.22.25  10:08 pm   favorite number?

      1

2.22.25  9:34 pm   How do you make your videos?

      i'll show you

2.22.25  9:16 pm   "savory" is the opposite of "sweet"

crispiness has nothing to do with it

      i was under the impression that "bitter" is the opposite of sweet. so that would mean either: bitter=savory OR, there are 2 different opposites of "sweet". neither option would entirely susprise me

2.22.25  9:00 pm   Do you think Luigi's mansion is pretty cool?

      i'll give you this, the mansion from luigi's mansion is cool

2.22.25  7:58 pm   What are your thoughts on insects?

      they're alright
